title: Taiwan presidential candidate plans US stop, drawing China’s ire
description: China decries plans of 'separatist' Taiwanese presidential frontrunner William Lai to stop in US during a Paraguay trip.

title: Alleged Pentagon leaker Teixeira calls for release, citing Trump

title: Turkey’s Erdogan arrives in Saudi Arabia to kick off Gulf tour

title: US chip lobby presses Biden to refrain from more China curbs
description: It says further rule-tightening by US risks 'disrupting supply chains, causing significant market uncertainty'.

title: New York City names its first Latino police commissioner
description: NYC mayor names 55-year-old Edward Caban as leader of the largest US police department, the first Latino in the role.

title: Drug found to slow Alzheimer’s by up to 60 percent in trial
description: Data presented by Eli Lilly suggests cognitive decline can be significantly slowed, but serious side effects persist.

title: Spain’s snap vote: Catalans fear right-wing takeover
